DataElement.preferredName: Planned Therapy Modality Occurrence Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text description of a planned treatment that is different from the ones previously mentioned or specified. [Manually-curated]

(NCI)A specific manner, characteristic, pattern of application or the employment of, any therapeutic agent or method of treatment, especially involving the physical treatment of a condition._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident
